Package jason.infra.centralised

Class BaseCentralisedMAS

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.management.NotificationBroadcasterSupport
      • jason.infra.centralised.BaseCentralisedMAS
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.management.NotificationBroadcaster, javax.management.NotificationEmitter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RunCentralisedMAS
    public abstract class BaseCentralisedMAS
extends javax.management.NotificationBroadcasterSupport
    Runs MASProject using centralised infrastructure.
